row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 16)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 6)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 10)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 1)
col_desc: Queen has zero lip sync wins.
Queen has at least one lip sync win.
Queen has one lip sync win.
